snippet: FRIEDLANDER--Eva. Eva Friedlander, age 74, died suddenly at home on December 24, 2015 after a prolonged struggle with ovarian cancer. Born in England to Holocaust refugees, Eva immigrated to the US as a child with her parents. She attended Hunter College and received her Ph.D. in anthropology from Brown University. Her areas of research expertise included gender and development, public health, disability studies, international development policy and participatory program evaluation. Eva was close to her brother, David Friedlander, who predeceased her in August 2010. She is survived by her beloved nephew, George, sister-in-law Edi, her cousins: Alan, Doris, Joe Renee, Marcia, Margaret, Richard, and numerous dear friends and colleagues. A memorial service for Eva will be held at the UN Chapel, 777 United Plaza, NY, NY 10017 on Saturday, February 27, 2016 at 12:00pm. 1/3
